As masters of cold, calculated logic and perfectly timed proselytization, the loathsome deimaviggas seek to set friend against friend and turn the faithful from their beliefs at every opportunity. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Deimavigga](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1116) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 66 **Perception** +32; (+36 to Sense Motive) greater darkvision **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); indomitable oration, [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +34, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +36, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +30, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +30, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +27, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +33 **Str** +7 **Dex** +8 **Con** +6 **Int** +4 **Wis** +7 **Cha** +9 **Indomitable Oration** Any creature capable of comprehending speech understands the deimavigga, as if they constantly spoke in all languages at once. **Items** _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [glamered](/Equipment.aspx?ID=286) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_ --- **AC** 40 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +29 **Will** +32 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 285 **Immunities** fire **Resistances** physical 15 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)) **Weaknesses** good 15 **Whispers of Discord** **Trigger** A creature within 60 feet is targeted by a spell that would restore Hit Points or provide a status bonus (the deimavigga automatically recognizes such effects); **Effect** The deimavigga whispers disturbing lies, audible only to the target, to shake the target's faith in the spell's caster. The target must attempt a DC 43 Will save.
**Critical Success** The target disbelieves the lies and receives the intended benefit of the spell; the target becomes temporarily immune to Whispers of Discord for 24 hours.
**Success** As critical success, but the target isn't temporarily immune.
**Failure** The spell fails to affect the target. The target refuses all aid from that caster for 1 round and doesn't count as the caster's ally.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the duration is 1 minute. --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** claw +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d8+15 slashing plus 1d6 evil **Divine Innate Spells** DC 42, attack +34 - **3rd** [Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90) (at will) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **7th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268), [Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341) (at will), [Veil](/Spells.aspx?ID=355), [Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) - **9th** [Divine Decree](/Spells.aspx?ID=82), [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161) (at will) **Rituals** DC 43 - **1st** [Infernal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=23) **Boundless Reach** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) A deimavigga's razor-sharp claws can slice through reality, allowing them to make claw Strikes and use spells with a range of touch against any creature they can see directly or via divination magic. A creature targeted this way can retaliate until the start of the deimavigga's next turn; it can target the devil's claws as if the devil were physically present and adjacent to the target, though the claws are concealed. **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The deimavigga can take on the appearance of any [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). This doesn't change their Speed or attack and damage bonuses with Strikes but might change the damage type their Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning). **Whisper Earworm** ([Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The deimavigga whispers a terrifying multiversal truth to one adjacent creature, shaking its faith in reality and divinity. The target must attempt a DC 43 Will save. [Celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) and [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) gain a +2 status bonus to this save.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected and temporarily immune to Whisper Earworm for 24 hours.
**Success** The target is unaffected.
**Failure** The next time the target rests, it ruminates on the deimavigga's words instead of sleeping or otherwise resting and awakens [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15). The target also becomes [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) until it's no longer fatigued.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but drained 2. After this rest, the target must attempt another DC 43 Will save. On a failure, the target becomes stupefied 2 and takes a –4 status penalty to Will saves against effects from evil creatures. These effects last until the target unlearns the truth spoken by the deimavigga, requiring a [_modify memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=200) spell, other means of modifying their memory, or powerful magic such as [_wish_](/Spells.aspx?ID=377).
Lone Operators While most devils perform a specialized role within a complex infernal machine, deimaviggas work almost exclusively alone, as they find even the most obedient minions a hindrance to their stratagems.
name: Deimavigga
